definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable id="HealthAbsorb" type="Number">HealthAbsorb</variable></variables><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">entity_attacked</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block inline="false" type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="logic_entity_compare"><field name="entity">CUSTOM:MobShade</field><value name="compareTo"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="logic_entity_compare"><field name="entity">CUSTOM:MobShade</field><value name="compareTo"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_set_health"><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="health"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_health"><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="custom_dependency_number"><field name="NAME">amount</field></block></value></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
